data.name: SimpleMailClientFlags
desc: These constants are used to specify how the SimpleMailClient Service should behave.

items.name: DEFAULTS
lines: Uses the default settings when sending a mail, e.g.
launches the current configured system mail client.

items.name: NO_USER_INTERFACE
lines: Does not show the current configured system mail client, but sends the mail without any further user interaction.
If this flag is specified, a recipient address must have been specified for the given XSimpleMailMessage object given to the method com.sun.star.system.XSimpleMailClient.sendSimpleMailMessage().

items.name: NO_LOGON_DIALOG
lines: No logon dialog should be displayed to prompt the user for logon information if necessary.

When this flag is specified and the user needs to logon in order to send a simple mail message via the method com.sun.star.system.XSimpleMailClient.sendSimpleMailMessage(), an Exception will be thrown.
